input.sentences: the family was celebrating the son 's graduation from college .
he had just received his diploma about a week ago .
his grandparents came to see him .
his aunts and uncles came as well .
they sat around in a circle and congratulated him .
output.sentences: The whole family arrived at the house to celebrate his graduation.
He was so proud of himself at the ceremony.
Everyone took pictures with the graduation boy.
They also made speeches and toasts in his honor.
His family spent the rest of the day enjoying each other's company.
